FuncDef:
The description command configures the description for an attack defense policy.
The undo description command deletes the description.
By default, no description is configured for an attack defense policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of an attack defense policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 characters that can contain spaces.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run the description command to configure the description for an attack defense policy.
The last configuration of the description command in the same attack defense policy view overwrites the previous configurations.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
The slot ID specified in the cpu-defend-policy command can be that of a board that has not been properly installed or registered.
